org.qbroker.common

Interface Requester

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Connector
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GenericRequester, IMQRequester, JMXRequester, PCFRequester, QMFMessenger, QMFRequester, SonicMQMessenger, SonicMQRequester

    public interface Requester
extends Connector
    Requester is an interface that sends the request to a generic service and waits for the response. The response is always a JSON text.
    Author:
    yannanlu@yahoo.com

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getResponse(java.lang.String request, java.lang.StringBuffer responseBuffer, boolean autoDisconnect)
      It sends the request to the destination and fills in the response to the proivided string buffer with JSON content.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.qbroker.common.Connector

        close, getURI, isConnected, reconnect

    • Method Detail

      • getResponse

        int getResponse(java.lang.String request,
              java.lang.StringBuffer responseBuffer,
              boolean autoDisconnect)
                throws WrapperException
        It sends the request to the destination and fills in the response to the proivided string buffer with JSON content. It returns number of items in the response buffer upon success or -1 for minor failure. In case of fatal failure, it throws WrapperException with cause set.
        Throws:
        WrapperException
